attributes.action: To acknowledge Mr Dean Windass to be honoured by the Queen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned wish to bring to the attention of those concerned the feeling that is felt towards proffesional footballer Mr Dean Windass to be honoured by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.
By scoring a goal at Wembley on May 24th 2008 to take Hull City into the Premier League for the first time in their history Mr Windass brought many many smiles to many fans of Hull City Football Club.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
